legal_basis: s. 50 of the Federal Court Act
procedural_fairness: Judicial discretion evaluated whether staying the action would cause injustice to either party based on evidence provided.
evidence_provided: Defendant sold its division accused of infringement before providing access to records or personnel.
standard_of_review: Prejudice or injustice to the defendant and does not harm the plaintiff.
cause_of_action: Defendant sought to avoid duplicate proceedings by staying its case until resolution of another involving Cummings Point.
